channel.title: [Misc] Death Note METE - Alison won!
channel.description:
![image|361x361](upload://uTnPIPJKKSXBFYfIcwGEMUDqplG.jpeg)
The King of Shinigami was very bored, so he decided to throw down 5 death notes into the human world and just watch people fight over them as a show.
## Rules: 0. The Host will be refered to as the [color=orange]Shinigami.[/color]
1. Each player will submit, aka pm, a custom one word name to me. Try to be as real as possible. These will be refered as [color=ligblue]Real Names[/color], while forum name will be refered as [color]Alias[/color]. These [color=ligblue]Real Names[/color] will be mixed together with a list of random generated names. There will be a total of 60-70 [color=ligblue]Real Names[/color] at the start of the game.
2. Every player will be assigned a team. They are the Kira Cult, Task Force Office, Mafia and SPK. Each team will have 4 persons, and team members’ [color=ligblue]Real Names[/color] are revealed in the team. Team name means nothing, just like red team blue team and etc. You will also get a chat where you can talk with your team members.
3. 2 Player from each team will be assigned as the Investigator, the other 2 will be the executor. Investigators, for every 12 Hour, can investigate a [color=ligblue]Real Names[/color] from the list to know their [color]Alias[/color](If any) and the number of [color=red]death note[/color] they own. While the Executors, for every 12 hours, can select a [color=ligblue]Real Names[/color] from the list and kill him, and get all their [color=red]death note[/color] if they have any. **Each player may choose to swap their role once in the entire game, from invest to exe or reversed.**
4. 5 Random players will spawn with a [color=red]death note[/color] For each Death note you own, you may select a [color=ligblue]Real Name[/color] from the list and kill him every 12 hours, and get their [color=red]death note[/color] if they have any. Just like the executors.
5. The ultimate goal for every player is to own a [color=red]death note[/color] when all the remaining player owns one. So, this is actually a FFA game
6. Each player have a betray ability to kill one of their teammate and get their [color=red]death note[/color], one use per game
7. In order to prevent players from fulfilling their roles less efficiently due to lack of time in real life, everyone may ask the [color=orange]Shinigami[/color] to schedule an action up to 24 hours forward from sending the pm.
8. Whenever a [color=ligblue]Real Name[/color] was killed, his death, his [color]Alias[/color] and Team(If any) will be announced in the thread
9. You can give [color=red]death note[/color] to other players as long as you know theirs [color=ligblue]Real Name[/color] and they know yours.
10. PMs with other players are allowed, as long as you add me to the dm chain.
11. Dead people are still allowed to communicate.
12. Have fun! And watch out for you “teammates”…
## List of Real Names: **Example 1:** Benjamin **Example 2:** Lucas **Example 3:** Sakamoto
## Players: 11. Hippo 16. Lastday
## Name lists: Alison Amber Angela Ashley Cyril Denver Eli Francis Harry Hoshiko Leopold Luna Noburu Raynard Saki Sayaka Tanika Tatianna Vikki Wilfredo

item.title: [Misc] Death Note METE - Alison won!
item.dc:creator: Pilica
item.description:
Traitor you. I would’ve never killed you pff.

At least you brought some kinda glory to our team. gg!

Read full topic

KyoDaz:

but I don’t like the fact that three players literally know my real name and can kill me for absolutely no reason and I can’t prevent it.

Laughs

item.title: [Misc] Death Note METE - Alison won!
item.dc:creator: Mercenary
item.description:
Met was the most precious FFA ally I’ve ever seen tbh
I told him I wanted to have an alliance (I really wanted to)
and he trusted me 100% putting himself on risk to save me
that was so pure I really wanted him to win tho, but he couldn’t get rezzed

Read full topic

item.title: [Misc] Death Note METE - Alison won!
item.dc:creator: Mercenary
item.description:
can we just buddy ourselves to death the next FFA game

Read full topic

item.title: [Misc] Death Note METE - Alison won!
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
Solic and Mercenary were in the game?

Read full topic

item.title: [Misc] Death Note METE - Alison won!
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
No, I didn’t You just didn’t want to work with me and we lost contact completely, so I don’t see that as a betrayal.

Read full topic

item.title: [Misc] Death Note METE - Alison won!
item.dc:creator: Mercenary
item.description:
you ended up betraying me tho

Read full topic

item.title: [Misc] Death Note METE - Alison won!
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
I didn’t intend to unless you attacked me.
I do try to stick to my agreements always.
I used the loophole in death. And that was the plan.

Read full topic

item.title: [Misc] Death Note METE - Alison won!
item.dc:creator: Blizer
item.description:
Yeah, i used the loophole

Read full topic

item.title: [Misc] Death Note METE - Alison won!
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
KyoDaz:

I agree on the premises you don’t ever attack me. I won’t attack you either.

KyoDaz:

You see, we agreed to not attacking eachother.
Nothing about not having other people attack the other for us.

Perfectly made deal apart from the fact the opponent could also use the loophole. As far as I am concerned.

Read full topic

item.title: [Misc] Death Note METE - Alison won!
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
I knew you wouldn’t attack me, but I knew you’d also most likely abuse the intentional loophole/failsafe I created.

Read full topic

item.title: [Misc] Death Note METE - Alison won!
item.dc:creator: Blizer
item.description:
And people keep trusting me lol

Read full topic

item.title: [Misc] Death Note METE - Alison won!
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
And you kept distrusting me after I was so honest to you.

Read full topic

item.title: [Misc] Death Note METE - Alison won!
item.dc:creator: Mercenary
item.description:
FFAs have an interesting reputation factor
will you be more or less trustable depending on your last FFA games
ie Ici betrayed me in NK:S1 when I was his only ally for no personal gain

Read full topic

item.title: [Misc] Death Note METE - Alison won!
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
I was very lucky to have Squid and Jgoes on my team to not worry about instantly dying. Well, I did fear Squid’s betray but I thought if they’d have done it then it would have been immediately.
Also @PoisonedSquid I did regret ‘betraying’ you the second time.
I also couldn’t bring myself to betraying Icibalus and cancelled the action.

Read full topic

item.title: [Misc] Death Note METE - Alison won!
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
Solic:

You’d obviously have that too with individuals though. Without predefined teams you can’t get screwed if you happen to rand Blizer on your team.

NK showdown had lots of deals too without teams.

Agreed.
I do like this game, but I don’t like the fact that three players literally know my real name and can kill me for absolutely no reason and I can’t prevent it.
I don’t really like that I can lose without having a chance.
I’d much prefer this in FFA. Then investigators would actually have some value as the only way to blackmail people.

Read full topic

item.title: [Misc] Death Note METE - Alison won!
item.dc:creator: Mercenary
item.description:
I bullshitted my way through NK showdown 2 whilst keeping an underdog profile
was fun as shit

Read full topic

I’d like to play with teams. We already have NK showdown for the FFA.

Teams made all kind of deals going around and thats why it got interesting.

item.title: [Misc] Death Note METE - Alison won!
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
I actually refused to betray you with the action, and I also tried to convince Blizer you were part of our team.
I believed the KP was better for your name overall. Also was pretty confident nobody in our team had deathnotes so our KP would be low.

Read full topic
